Title: Directs the office of children and family services to conduct a study and report on the feasibility of providing year-round, out-of-school programming
Summary: Directs the office of children and family services to conduct a study and report on the feasibility of providing year-round, out-of-school programming to every child in New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the office of children and family services to conduct a study to evaluate the feasibility of providing year-round, out-of-school programming to every child in New York that desires to participate
